summary: A nice little teaser weapons pack.
descriptionHtml:
***REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC***

So rather than horde all of the assets from my upcoming DLC sized mod: Hammerfell all to myself, I've decided to put one of the weapon packs here for now.

This mod adds:

-Stone Arrows
-Stone Battleaxe
-Stone Dagger
-Stone Greatsword
-Stone Mace
-Stone Sword
-Stone Warhammer
-Branch Bow
-Raw Stone (for crafting)
-Special Bonus Weapon!

And as a special treat I've added a tiny new dungeon, with every new item, guarded by a fairly tough atronach, just outside of Riverwood.

All the new weapons are craftable under the Misc category, and the bonus weapon is craftable as well. The Branch Bow isn't craftable yet, but that will be coming soon. The Raw Stones have been added to levelled lists, but the new weapons have not.

I retextured all of these myself in GIMP, and I've tested them extensively. If you see any errors, please let me know as your feedback will help me improve the larger mod as well.

Also, if you like this mod, keep an eye on this page for upcoming Developer Videos in regards to Hammerfell.
author: CalledFireX
